description.value:
You gain an Eikonic Number as detailed in the @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.CTOHXD4403501WIK]{Eikonic Numbers} Cleric Starter Ability.

Additionally, based on your Eikonic Number Potency, assign one or both of the following Mantras to this new Eikonic Number of Chaos:

  • Chaotic: You can immediately either:
    • Cause a small object to move a few feet.
    • Cause a small fragile object to crack or shatter.
    • Swap places with a creature up to 10ft away.
  • Control of Chaos: You can re-roll 1 die before the end of your next turn, and must take the new result.
  • Embrace the Chaos: A creature of your choice that you can see takes 1d10 chaos damage. You take half of the damage dealt, unless you spend a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die to negate the damage against yourself.
